com.sri.ai.expresso.core

Class AbstractSyntaxTree

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.sri.ai.expresso.core.AbstractSyntaxTree
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SyntaxTree, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<java.lang.Object>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DefaultCompoundSyntaxTree, DefaultSyntaxLeaf

    @Beta
public abstract class AbstractSyntaxTree
extends java.lang.Object
implements SyntaxTree, java.io.Serializable
    A basic, default implementation of some SyntaxTree and helper methods.
    Author:
    braz
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      Makes a shallow copy of this tree.

      Returns the list of subtrees.
      java.util.Iterator<SyntaxTree> getImmediateSubTreesIterator()
      An iterator-based (and therefore possibly lazy) version of SyntaxTree.getImmediateSubTrees().
      SyntaxTree getSubTree(java.lang.Object fieldKey)
      Returns the subtree corresponding to a given key (so far, only integers are supported), with -1 representing the label.
      int numberOfImmediateSubTrees()
      Returns the number of subtrees in this tree.

      Replaces each subtree or root tree s by replacementFunction.evaluate(s) if it is non-null and a different instance.

        Just like SyntaxTree.replaceSubTreesFirstOccurrence(SyntaxTree, SyntaxTree), but with a pruning predicate. A pruning predicate ignores subtrees or root tree for which it evaluates as true.

      • replaceSubTreesFirstOccurrence

        public SyntaxTree replaceSubTreesFirstOccurrence(com.google.common.base.Function<SyntaxTree,SyntaxTree> replacementFunction)
        Description copied from interface: SyntaxTree
        Replaces the first (in depth-first order) subtree or root tree s by replacementFunction.evaluate(s) if it is non-null and a different instance from s. Does not operate on the subtree replacement itself. Returns this if there are no replacements.
        Specified by:
        replaceSubTreesFirstOccurrence in interface SyntaxTree

      • replaceSubTreesFirstOccurrence

        public SyntaxTree replaceSubTreesFirstOccurrence(com.google.common.base.Function<SyntaxTree,SyntaxTree> replacementFunction,
                                                 com.sri.ai.util.base.BinaryProcedure<SyntaxTree,SyntaxTree> listener)
        Description copied from interface: SyntaxTree
        Replaces the first (in depth-first order) subtree or root tree s by replacementFunction.evaluate(s) if it is non-null and a different instance from s. Does not operate on the replacement itself. Returns this if there are no replacements. Calls a listener on both given and returned trees.
        Specified by:
        replaceSubTreesFirstOccurrence in interface SyntaxTree

        Description copied from interface: SyntaxTree
        Replaces each subtree or root tree s by replacementFunction.evaluate(s) if it is non-null and a different instance. Does not operate on replacements themselves. Returns this if there are no replacements. Calls a listener on both given and returned trees.
